<template>
  <textarea :placeholder="placeholder" class="default__textarea" v-model="result"></textarea>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  props: {
    placeholder: {
      type: String,
      default: "",
    },
    label: {
      type: String,
      default: "",
    },
  },
  date(){
    return{result:""}
  }, watch:{
   result(){
this.$emit('textarea-text',this.result)
    }
  }
};
</script>
